page.title: 13Leisure Activities.
page.content: There are many{leisure activities}in Shawbury and they suit people of all ages. There are{evening classes}held in the schools.They include computer studies,keep fit,bridge,art and wine tasting. There is a{scout and guide}hut.Cubs, scouts,guides,brownies and beavers are held there. In Shawbury there are a lot of facilities for{sports activities.} These include a cricket ground,bowling club,tennis courts,football pitch, B.M.X.track and a playground. There is a{parish hall}in Shawbury and there are a lot of activities which go on there such as whist drives,fashion shows,dances,library, young farmers,british legion,youth club,W.I.,drama group,flower club, bingo and senior citizens club. {
